p.q: Braulio wants to reinforce his students' writing skills by having them work on a persuasive piece of writing. He will take advantage of the school anniversary. In this context, which of the following activities is more appropriate for his purpose?

as.a: Have the students write a speech on the way a teacher has influenced their academic and personal life. Ask them to include examples of how they have become better persons thanks to that teacher. The best speeches will be read at the anniversary ceremony.

Have the students write an essay about the things they like most about their school. Ask them to describe good memories such as anecdotes, celebrations, school trips, etc. Some of their final products will be posted on the school bulletin board.

Have the students write a flyer to motivate the school community to participate in the anniversary ceremony. Ask them to include arguments and appealing information. The flyers will be distributed within the school premises.
